Rodimus:

"We can take advantage of that"said thoughtfully the male while he 
opened his comlink, and looked that Kenzo had left CR. Rodimus spoke 
to his com link"Kenzo, how do you feel? are you all right??"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: If this counts as posting for Unicron, disregard
> it.
> 
> "Very well then," said Fortuneteller, "allow me a
> moment."
> 
> She knew this was beyond her bolts, she would have to
> look deeper.  She put them away, and picked up her
> staff.  She felt for where Unicron was, and pointed it
> there.  She closed her eyes, and began to see.
> 
> "There's...a...a...a matainence shaft that's
> unguarded, because it has a powerful shield
> surrounding it.  Unicron merely lowers the shield when
> neccessary for repair purposes.  But every two
> Megacycles the shields weaken, due to a standard
> intruder scan, for fifteen cycles.  If you situate
> youself outside of Unicron, and have a shield
> puncturer (OOC: Not sure what that thing Black Aracnia
> used was called), then at the last minute, after the
> scan is through but before the shield is re-raised,
> you can open a hole and get in."
> 
> The effort finally overcame her, and she fell to her
> hands and knees panting.
